translations.modules.network.port_scan.label: Port Scan
translations.modules.network.port_scan.description: Scan ports on a host to check which are open
translations.modules.network.port_scan.params.host.de: Hostname or IP address to scan
translations.modules.network.port_scan.params.ports.d: Ports to scan: comma-separated (80,443), range (80-443), or leave empty for common ports
translations.modules.network.port_scan.params.timeout: Connection timeout in seconds per port
translations.modules.network.whois.label: WHOIS Lookup
translations.modules.network.whois.description: Perform WHOIS lookup for a domain to retrieve registration information
translations.modules.network.traceroute.label: Traceroute
translations.modules.network.traceroute.description: Trace the route packets take to reach a destination host
translations.modules.network.traceroute.params.host.d: Hostname or IP address to trace route to
translations.modules.network.traceroute.params.max_ho: Maximum number of hops to trace
translations.modules.network.traceroute.params.timeou: Timeout in seconds for each probe
translations.modules.network.traceroute.output.hops.d: List of hops along the route
translations.modules.network.traceroute.output.total_: Total number of hops to reach destination
translations.modules.network.ping.label: Ping
translations.modules.network.ping.description: Ping a host to check connectivity and measure latency
translations.modules.network.ping.params.host.label: Host
translations.modules.network.ping.params.host.descrip: Hostname or IP address to ping
translations.modules.network.ping.params.count.label: Count
translations.modules.network.ping.params.count.descri: Number of ping packets to send
translations.modules.network.ping.params.timeout.desc: Timeout in seconds for each packet
translations.modules.network.ping.output.latency_ms.d: Latency statistics in milliseconds (min, avg, max)
